text: Surrey Quays is a station on the East London line branch of the London Overground. ==Background== It is located in Rotherhithe, which is part of London Borough of Southwark. It is in Travelcard Zone 2 and the next station to the north is . To the south, the railway splits into two branches. One goes to . The other goes to New Cross, Crystal Palace and West Croydon. The station was closed in late 2007 for refurbishment. It re-opened on 27 April 2010 as part of the London Overground network. ==References== Category:London Overground stations Category:2007 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:2000s disestablishments in England Category:2010 establishments in England
title: Surrey Quays railway station
